title: Apple:1984 Launch  "The Lost 1984 Mac Video"
description:
Four parts filmed for real for apple launch 1984

Part 1:
Steve Jobs opens the meeting by reciting Bob Dylans &quot;The Times They Are A-Changin'&quot;: &quot;Come writers and critics who prophesize with your pen...&quot;.

Part 2:
The lights are dimmed so that you can hardly see Steve: &quot;It is now 1984. Was George Orwell right?&quot; And then the already famous 1984 commercial fills the screen....Read the story on folklore.org.

Part 3:
 It shows the official introduction of the Macintosh by Steve Jobs

Part 4:
Steve adresses the two target markets for the Mac and introduces five TV clips, made by ChiatDay, including &quot;Manuals&quot;, the spot that almost aired instead of &quot;1984&quot;. Read the story on folklore.org
